events.name: ICC Issues Arrest Warrant for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova
events.wd_label: ICC Issues Arrest Warrant for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova
events.wd_description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) issued arrest warrants for Russian President Vladimir Putin and Russian official Maria Lvova-Belova, accusing them of involvement in the deportation of Ukrainian children to Russia.
events.description: The International Criminal Court (ICC) issued arrest warrants for Russian President Vladimir Putin and Russian official Maria Lvova-Belova, accusing them of involvement in the deportation of Ukrainian children to Russia.

events.name: ICC Arrest Warrants
events.wd_description: The International Criminal Court issued arrest warrants for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova, alleging their involvement in a scheme to deport Ukrainian children to Russia.
events.description: The International Criminal Court issued arrest warrants for Vladimir Putin and Maria Lvova-Belova, alleging their involvement in a scheme to deport Ukrainian children to Russia.

events.name: Allegations of Child Deportation
events.wd_description: The ICC stated that it has sufficient evidence to believe that Putin and Lvova-Belova were involved in the deportation of Ukrainian children and that Putin failed to exercise control over subordinates who committed these acts.
events.description: The ICC stated that it has sufficient evidence to believe that Putin and Lvova-Belova were involved in the deportation of Ukrainian children and that Putin failed to exercise control over subordinates who committed these acts.

events.name: Ukraine's Response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed appreciation for the ICC's decision and noted that Ukrainian investigations suggest direct Kremlin involvement in the forced deportation of children.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed appreciation for the ICC's decision and noted that Ukrainian investigations suggest direct Kremlin involvement in the forced deportation of children.

events.name: Germany and UK Send Tanks to Ukraine
events.wd_label: Germany and UK Send Tanks to Ukraine
events.wd_description: Germany has sent the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, while the UK has delivered Challenger 2 tanks. The tanks are expected to play a decisive role on the frontlines of the war in Ukraine.
events.description: Germany has sent the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, while the UK has delivered Challenger 2 tanks. The tanks are expected to play a decisive role on the frontlines of the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Delivery of Leopard 2 Tanks
events.wd_description: Germany confirmed the delivery of the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, with German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius expressing confidence in their impact on the battlefield.
events.description: Germany confirmed the delivery of the first shipment of Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, with German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius expressing confidence in their impact on the battlefield.

events.name: UK Challenger 2 Tanks Sent to Ukraine
events.wd_label: UK Challenger 2 Tanks Sent to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The UK also sent its Challenger 2 tanks to Ukraine, marking a significant contribution to Ukraine's military capabilities in the ongoing conflict.
events.description: The UK also sent its Challenger 2 tanks to Ukraine, marking a significant contribution to Ukraine's military capabilities in the ongoing conflict.

events.name: Training and Additional Equipment
events.wd_description: Ukrainian soldiers have been trained in Germany to operate the advanced A6 variant of the Leopard 2 tanks. Ukraine also received two specialist tank-recovery vehicles and 40 Marder infantry fighting vehicles from Germany.
events.description: Ukrainian soldiers have been trained in Germany to operate the advanced A6 variant of the Leopard 2 tanks. Ukraine also received two specialist tank-recovery vehicles and 40 Marder infantry fighting vehicles from Germany.

events.name: Surge in COVID-19 Deaths in China Following Lifting of Zero-COVID Policy
events.wd_label: Surge in COVID-19 Deaths in China Following Lifting of Zero-COVID Policy
events.wd_description: China experienced a significant surge in COVID-19 deaths after President Xi lifted the Zero-COVID Policy, with most deaths occurring among elderly individuals with underlying conditions.
events.description: China experienced a significant surge in COVID-19 deaths after President Xi lifted the Zero-COVID Policy, with most deaths occurring among elderly individuals with underlying conditions.

events.name: Surge in COVID-19 Deaths
events.wd_description: A significant increase in COVID-19 deaths has been reported in China since December 2022, particularly among individuals over 65 with underlying conditions, following the lifting of the Zero-COVID Policy.
events.description: A significant increase in COVID-19 deaths has been reported in China since December 2022, particularly among individuals over 65 with underlying conditions, following the lifting of the Zero-COVID Policy.

events.name: Lifting of Zero-COVID Policy
events.wd_description: The surge in COVID-19 cases and deaths began shortly after President Xi Jinping lifted China's Zero-COVID Policy, allowing for increased movement ahead of the holidays.
events.description: The surge in COVID-19 cases and deaths began shortly after President Xi Jinping lifted China's Zero-COVID Policy, allowing for increased movement ahead of the holidays.

events.name: International Response
events.wd_description: In response to the surge in COVID-19 cases and deaths in China, several countries issued mandatory testing for travelers coming from China.
events.description: In response to the surge in COVID-19 cases and deaths in China, several countries issued mandatory testing for travelers coming from China.

events.name: Expert Warnings and Travel Advisories
events.wd_description: Experts believe that the surge in deaths may have peaked in some areas but warned that increased travel could lead to a further rise in cases, advising people to limit visits to certain areas.
events.description: Experts believe that the surge in deaths may have peaked in some areas but warned that increased travel could lead to a further rise in cases, advising people to limit visits to certain areas.

events.name: US Efforts to Secure EV Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_label: US Efforts to Secure EV Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_description: The US is prioritizing the security of EV battery supply chains and the requisite minerals to facilitate clean energy deployment, reduce reliance on China, and enhance industrial competitiveness, supported by the Inflation Reduction Act.
events.description: The US is prioritizing the security of EV battery supply chains and the requisite minerals to facilitate clean energy deployment, reduce reliance on China, and enhance industrial competitiveness, supported by the Inflation Reduction Act.

events.name: Inflation Reduction Act Provisions
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act includes credits and incentives to support the domestic manufacturing and processing of battery components and critical materials, prohibiting credits for components sourced from China.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act includes credits and incentives to support the domestic manufacturing and processing of battery components and critical materials, prohibiting credits for components sourced from China.

events.name: Investment in US Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_label: Investment in US Battery Supply Chains
events.wd_description: Significant investments in US EV battery supply chains have been made, including GM's $650 million investment in Thacker Pass, with projections of $91 billion in investments over the next 10 years.
events.description: Significant investments in US EV battery supply chains have been made, including GM's $650 million investment in Thacker Pass, with projections of $91 billion in investments over the next 10 years.

events.name: China's Dominance and Expansion
events.wd_description: China continues to dominate the EV battery supply chain, with significant investments and expansions both domestically and internationally, including in Europe.
events.description: China continues to dominate the EV battery supply chain, with significant investments and expansions both domestically and internationally, including in Europe.

events.name: Complex US-China Rivalry
events.wd_description: The rivalry between the US and China in the EV battery value chain is complex, with US automakers engaging with Chinese suppliers while also seeking partnerships with non-Chinese battery makers.
events.description: The rivalry between the US and China in the EV battery value chain is complex, with US automakers engaging with Chinese suppliers while also seeking partnerships with non-Chinese battery makers.
